mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (title, link, author, pub_date, description, isbn_13, item_id, price_sales, price_standard, cover, category_id, category_name, publisher, best_rank) VALUES (#{title}, #{link}, #{author}, #{pubDate}, #{description}, #{isbn13}, #{itemId}, #{priceSales}, #{priceStandard}, #{cover}, #{categoryId}, #{categoryName}, #{publisher}, #{bestRank})
